critique: This executive order provides regulations for withholding city income or employment taxes from the compensation of federal employees. It defines key terms, sets parameters for agreements between the Secretary of the Treasury and cities, and delegates authority to the Secretary of the Treasury to prescribe further rules. There is no clear indication of ideological bias, immigration approach, expansion of executive power, or impact on national security vs. civil liberties. It seems to have a slight impact on federalism and economic regulation. It does not seem to have any impact on social inclusion. Therefore, the initial scores are as follows:
